name: Marley
body:
## Marley Plays Reggae for Jamaica

Reggae is a JSON data interchange format.  Please see the [Reggae syntax diagram](http://herbdaily.github.com/marley/reggae_syntax.xhtml) for details.
tagline: Marley is a framework for building RESTful web services and applications with roughly O(n) lines code where n the number of tables in the applications
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
